name: part_006
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY1】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment hololive stage1 DAY1【チラ見せ】 [00xeNL3vdQo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Promotion for various hololive production merchandise from Bandai and Bandai Spirits.
Promotion for the 'Weiß Schwarz' hololive production Summer Collection cards.
Promotion for the 'Weiß Schwarz Blau' Holostars cards.
Promotion for hololive member Nendoroids in new outfits by Good Smile Company.
Promotion for 'hololive' prize figures from FuRyu coming to amusement centers.
Promotion for Gawr Gura iPASS cards featuring sushi-themed designs.
Promotion for the 'Miruhako' service by JOYSOUND for enjoying idol content in karaoke rooms.
Visual promotion for a Hoshimachi Suisei 1/7 scale figure by Design COCO.
A rolling montage of handwritten fan messages for 'hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment'.

subtitles.original: ガシャポンや一番くじなど、たくさんの商品が発売いたします。
subtitles.english: Gashapon, Ichiban Kuji, and many other products are now on sale.

subtitles.original: バンダイブース、BANDAI SPIRITSブースでは、会場限定グッズも無料配布中！
subtitles.english: At the Bandai and BANDAI SPIRITS booths, venue-exclusive goods are being distributed for free!

subtitles.original: プレバンではすぐに使えるクーポンもらえる！
subtitles.english: On Premium Bandai, you can get coupons that can be used immediately!

subtitles.original: ヴァイスシュヴァルツ！楽しむ準備はいい？
subtitles.english: Weiß Schwarz! Are you ready to have fun?

subtitles.original: ヴァイスシュヴァルツの舞台でも、青春しよ！
subtitles.english: Let's enjoy our youth on the stage of Weiß Schwarz too!

subtitles.original: プレミアムブースター ホロライブプロダクション サマーコレクション 3月22日発売！
subtitles.english: Premium Booster: Hololive Production Summer Collection. On sale March 22nd!

subtitles.original: ホロスターズがヴァイスシュヴァルツブラウに登場！
subtitles.english: Holostars appears in Weiß Schwarz Blau!

subtitles.original: ようこそ、カードゲームの舞台へ。
subtitles.english: Welcome to the stage of card games.

subtitles.original: スタートデッキ＆ブースターパック「ホロスターズ」好評発売中！
subtitles.english: Start Deck & Booster Pack 'Holostars' now on sale!

subtitles.original: hololive SUPER EXPO 2024開催を記念して、
subtitles.english: Commemorating the holding of hololive SUPER EXPO 2024,

subtitles.original: ホロライブメンバーのねんどろいどが、新衣装になって再登場！
subtitles.english: Nendoroids of Hololive members return in new outfits!

subtitles.original: 新しいねんどろいどもお楽しみに！
subtitles.english: Look forward to the new Nendoroids!

subtitles.original: フリューから「ホロライブ」プライズが全国アミューズメント施設に、2024年7月以降に続々登場！
subtitles.english: Hololive prizes from FuRyu will appear one after another in amusement facilities nationwide from July 2024 onwards!

subtitles.original: 今後国内のホロライブメンバー全員展開予定！
subtitles.english: Planned to expand to all domestic Hololive members in the future!

subtitles.original: 推しの曲、めっちゃいいね！
subtitles.english: My favorite's song is so good!

subtitles.original: みるハコなら、臨場感たっぷりで推しのコンテンツが楽しめる！
subtitles.english: With Miruhako, you can enjoy your favorite's content with plenty of presence!

subtitles.original: みるハコ最高！推し事増やそう！
subtitles.english: Miruhako is the best! Let's increase our fan activities!
